page.title: 01General Overview of the Area
page.content: The land in this block is{largely} {agricultural}but includes sections of residential areas from three towns - {Castleford,Pontefract and Knottingley. The area is dominated by{Ferrybridge {Power Station}which can be seen from all corners of the block as well as much further afield.The{M.62}runs from east to west through the block.{Mining is probably the biggest single source of employment and the effects of the {miners strike (1984-85)}were felt throughout the area.Unemployment is slightly higher than the national average (about 14%).Very few people are employed in agriculture.The people involved in compiling the information normally have very little contact with each other.Airedale people regard Castleford as their main centre while Ferrybridge people look to Pontefract and Knottingley.
